bibl.bibl: Journal of researches 2d ed.: Journal of researches into the natural history and geology of the countries visited during the voyage of HMS Beagle round the world, under the command of Capt. FitzRoy RN. 2d edition, corrected, with additions. By Charles Darwin. London: John Murray. 1845.
bibl.idno: WB2 CCA.24.7; NC LO.54.22; the CCA is evidently the [1848] issue of this edition (see Murray 1977, p. 36). SD
